JOIN TBL_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_CODE)
WHERE ORDERABLE_STATUS = 'Y'
AND MENU_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ value } || '%'
AND CATEGORY_NAME = #{ value }
ORDER BY MENU_CODE
